title: Those Who Hunt Elves (Dub)
alternative_title: Elf wo Karu Mono-tachi; エルフを狩るモノたち
description: n actor, a martial artist, a gun-crazy high school student, and their tank are transported from earth to a world of elves and magic. However, the spell to return them home was botched resulting in fragments of the spell being magicly imprinted onto their skin. Their solution: run around looking for elves and stripping them whereever they find them.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
